short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is Business Model Canvas for Trello extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is Business Model Canvas Trello extension. 

The Business Model Canvas (BMC) is a strategic management tool to quickly and easily define and communicate a business idea or concept. It is a one page document which works through the fundamental elements of a business or product, structuring an idea in a coherent way. This also means you can start with a brain dump, filling out the segments the spring to your mind first and then work on the empty segments to close the gaps.

For more info about BMC:

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Business_Model_Canvas

I love Trello and use Business Model Canvas for myself so I decided to create this extension for Trello and use it daily myself. It looks better then the usual column-wize Trello mode and fits all of it to the screen. 

This is a Beta version of the extension. I hope you will not provide a negative rating. For any suggestions, send me an email and I will consider to improve it.

*** Usage *** :

Press on an extension icon to "canvanize" it.

*** Limitations ***:

The column names should be as follows and in the following order:

1) Key Partners
2) Key Activities
3) Key Resources
4) Cost Structure
5) Value Proposition
6) Customer Relationships
7) Channels
8) Customer Segments
9) Revenue Streams

*** Next version ***:

Make "Cost Structure" and "Revenue Stream" dual-column.
